entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 04:30 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 13.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023
